messages.text: Consulta para extraer datos con subqueries

text_entities.text: Consulta para extraer datos con subqueries

text:
SELECT re.rental_id  "CODIGORENTA",
       re.rental_date "FECHARENTA",
       year(re.rental_date) "AÃ‘ORENTA",
       month(re.rental_date) "MESRENTA",
       quarter(re.rental_date) "CUATRIRENTA",
       re.inventory_id,
       re.customer_id,
       (select concat(cu.first_name,' ',cu.last_name) from customer cu where cu.customer_id = re.customer_id  ) "CLIENTE",
       (select cu.active from customer cu where cu.customer_id = re.customer_id  ) "ACTIVO", 
       (select

from customer cu where cu.customer_id = re.customer_id  ) "EMAIL",
       ( select concat(ad.address,' - ',ad.district) from address ad where ad.address_id = (select cu.address_id from customer cu where cu.customer_id = re.customer_id  ) ) "DOMICILIO",
       re.return_date,
       re.staff_id "CODVEND-RENTA",
       re.last_update,
       pa.payment_id,
       pa.staff_id "CODVEND-COBRA",
       pa.amount,
       pa.payment_date,
       1 "CUENTA"
FROM rental re,
   payment pa
where re.rental_id = pa.rental_id;

text_entities.text:
SELECT re.rental_id  "CODIGORENTA",
       re.rental_date "FECHARENTA",
       year(re.rental_date) "AÃ‘ORENTA",
       month(re.rental_date) "MESRENTA",
       quarter(re.rental_date) "CUATRIRENTA",
       re.inventory_id,
       re.customer_id,
       (select concat(cu.first_name,' ',cu.last_name) from customer cu where cu.customer_id = re.customer_id  ) "CLIENTE",
       (select cu.active from customer cu where cu.customer_id = re.customer_id  ) "ACTIVO", 
       (select
cu.email

from customer cu where cu.customer_id = re.customer_id  ) "EMAIL",
       ( select concat(ad.address,' - ',ad.district) from address ad where ad.address_id = (select cu.address_id from customer cu where cu.customer_id = re.customer_id  ) ) "DOMICILIO",
       re.return_date,
       re.staff_id "CODVEND-RENTA",
       re.last_update,
       pa.payment_id,
       pa.staff_id "CODVEND-COBRA",
       pa.amount,
       pa.payment_date,
       1 "CUENTA"
FROM rental re,
   payment pa
where re.rental_id = pa.rental_id;

messages.text: Buenos dÃ­as profe! Como estÃ¡? Le hago una consulta, el trabajo integrador, informe y el trabajo en Kibana es en grupo o individual?

text_entities.text: Buenos dÃ­as profe! Como estÃ¡? Le hago una consulta, el trabajo integrador, informe y el trabajo en Kibana es en grupo o individual?

messages.text:
Marcos,  se pueden presentar en forma individual,  o en grupo de no mÃ¡s de 4 integrantes.  Para el de Kibana les recomiendo que usen un dataset de Kaggle,  busquen un csv, sqlite o zip que tenga unos 20k registros al menos como para que tenga info para analizar.
Cualquier duda,  me consultan
